longDescription:
Near Yosemite: This vacation lodge fronts the wild Merced River and is just 2 miles from the entrance to Yosemite National Park.

Outdoor pool, spa tub: Outdoor pools, spa tubs, and a patio afford views of the rushing waters of the Merced River to guests at Yosemite View Lodge.

Kitchenettes: Yosemite View Lodge guestrooms feature river-view balconies, well-equipped kitchenettes, cable/satellite TVs, and dual showerheads.

Rooms
The four-floor Yosemite View Lodge features 336 guestrooms decorated in a mountain-lodge style. Private bathrooms have shower/tub combinations. Rooms include fully equipped kitchenettes with refrigerator, microwave, two-burner stovetop, toaster, dishes, and utensils. Furnished balconies overlook the Merced River. Some rooms include gas fireplaces and jetted tubs. Wireless Internet access (surcharge), free local calls and cable TVs are also available.

Dining
The River Restaurant - Serves fine cuisine, cocktails and beverages. Breakfasts and dinners are served daily. Parkside Pizza - Serves pizza, sandwiches, fresh salads, and refreshing beverages. Closed from November through March.

Fees

  • The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.
    • Fee for in-room wireless Internet: USD 9.99 per 24-hour period (rates may vary)
    • Pet fee: USD 10 per pet, per day
    • Crib (infant bed) fee: USD $10.00 per night
    • Rollaway bed fee: USD $10.00 per night
  • The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

Location Highlights

  • On river
  • In mountains

Property Amenities
The Yosemite View Lodge has three pools—one indoor and two outdoor—and five spa tubs, including four outside on the patio. One of the outside pools and several of the spa tubs have views of the wild Merced River rushing alongside the hotel. The hotel also has a snack bar, a restaurant and a pizzeria. The hotel's tour desk can assist with arranging Yosemite National Park adventures.

  • Indoor pool
  • Outdoor pool
  • Spa tub
  • Safe-deposit box at front desk
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Multilingual staff
  • Total number of rooms - 336
  • Number of floors - 4
  • ATM/banking
  • Gift shops or newsstand
  • Laundry facilities
  • Picnic area
  • Elevator/lift
  • Breakfast available (surcharge)
  • Coffee/tea in lobby
  • Grocery/convenience store
  • Tours/ticket assistance
  • WiFi (surcharge)
  • Free area shuttle
  • Number of restaurants - 2
  • Free RV, bus, truck parking
  • Snack bar/deli
  • Free self parking
  • Number of buildings/towers - 6

Room Amenities

  • Premium TV channels
  • Fireplace
  • Climate control
  • Air conditioning
  • Access via exterior corridors
  • Phone
  • Free local calls
  • Kitchenette
  • Refrigerator
  • Coffee/tea maker
  • Microwave
  • Cookware, dishware, and utensils
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Private bathroom
  • Free toiletries
  • Hair dryer
  • Shower/tub combination
  • Iron/ironing board (on request)
  • Cable TV service
  • WiFi (surcharge)
  • Cribs/infant beds (surcharge)
  • Rollaway/extra beds (surcharge)

Recreation
The wild and winding Merced River, right behind the lodge, is renowned for white-water rafting. Yosemite National Park, a mountain wonderland, offers hiking, rock-climbing, fishing, birding, wildlife viewing, bicycling, horseback riding, swimming, rafting, skiing, snowshoeing, and strolls through ancient sequoia groves. The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or near the hotel; fees may apply.

  • Golfing nearby
  • Downhill skiing nearby
  • Cross-country skiing nearby
  • Snowshoeing nearby
  • Kayaking nearby
  • Rafting nearby
  • Mountain biking nearby
  • Hiking/biking trails nearby
  • Bicycle rentals nearby
  • Sledding nearby
  • Snow tubing nearby

Points of Interest

  • Yosemite Arch Rock Gate Entrance - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
  • Tunnel View - 9 km / 5.6 mi
  • Badger Pass - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
  • Bridalveil Falls - 11.1 km / 6.9 mi
  • El Capitan - 13.1 km / 8.1 mi
  • Yosemite Valley - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi
  • Yosemite Big Oak Flat Entrance - 16.6 km / 10.3 mi
  • Yosemite Falls - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi
  • Sentinel Dome - 16.9 km / 10.5 mi
  • Yosemite Visitor Center - 17.6 km / 10.9 mi
  • Yosemite Museum Gallery - 17.6 km / 11 mi
  • Glacier Point - 17.7 km / 11 mi
  • Pioneer Yosemite History Center - 18.2 km / 11.3 mi
  • Wawona Visitor Center - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi
  • Wawona Golf Course - 18.6 km / 11.5 mi
The preferred airport for Yosemite View Lodge is Fresno, CA (FAT-Fresno Yosemite Intl.) - 101.1 km / 62.8 mi. Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

Policies

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Pets allowed
  • Check-in time starts at 3 PM
  • Check-out time is 11 AM
  • Minimum check-in age is 21
  • Only dogs are allowed
  • Maximum number of pets per room 1
  • Pet maximum weight in lb is 110.23
  • American Express
  • MasterCard
  • Visa
